LinkItem.internal_link_text: Solution Guide - Connect a classic VNet to and ARM VNet by using a S2S VPN

Create a VPN gateway for the classic VNet
Create a VPN gateway for the classic VNet
Create a VPN gateway for the ARM VNet
Create a VPN gateway for the ARM VNet
Create a connection between the gateways
Create a connection between the gateways

MarkdownCodeBlock.code_block: New-AzureVirtualNetworkGateway -Name v1v2Gateway -ResourceGroupName RG1 ` -Location "East US" -GatewayType Vpn -IpConfigurations $ipconfig ` -EnableBgp $false -VpnType RouteBased

$vnet01gateway = Get-AzureLocalNetworkGateway -Name VNetClassic -ResourceGroupName RG1 $vnet02gateway = Get-AzureVirtualNetworkGateway -Name v1v2Gateway -ResourceGroupName RG1
New-AzureVirtualNetworkGatewayConnection -Name arm-asm-s2s-connection ` -ResourceGroupName RG1 -Location "East US" -VirtualNetworkGateway1 $vnet02gateway ` -LocalNetworkGateway2 $vnet01gateway -ConnectionType IPsec ` -RoutingWeight 10 -SharedKey 'abc123'
